
Interpolate NaN values
  Indicate that graph may have undefined areas
    Use interpolation mask to change faceColor array

-Global graph settings
  background
  axis limits
  axis labels on/off
-Create side panel for equation inputs
  latex dropdown box
  show/hide graph
  settings menu: color, colormap, opacity, max, min, resolution
    slider menu, vignette menu...
-Pickle the state, save workspace, save equation
